strapiPost.title: Residential Community For Neurodiverse Adults Underway In Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
Supporting Lifelong Success, or SLS, will be Arkansasâ€™s first nonprofit residential community for neurodiverse adults. 

  • One of a kind: The state of the art SLS facility will feature housing, clinics, work opportunities, and spaces for recreation on a property adjacent to Kessler Mountain Park in southwest Fayetteville. 
  • All belong: SLS Community is grounded in the mission of making essential resources accessible to neurodiverse adults and their families, 

Listen to KUAF interview with SLS executive director Ashton McCombs IV HERE.
